Description: Scroll-stopping YouTube thumbnails optimized for CTR and delivered quickly.
SuiteDash Workflow Steps:
1. Create SuiteDash intake form for video URL, brand guidelines, and style preferences.
2. Generate client portal folder for thumbnail variants.
3. Use task templates: Designer assigned → Review → Deliver final.
4. Set automation: when client submits intake, auto-create project and assign designer.
5. Deliver 3 variants in portal; collect feedback with portal comments or form.
Integrations/Tools: SuiteDash Portal/Forms/Projects, Make (notify team), ActiveCampaign (feedback follow-ups)

Description: Professional editing of raw footage into engaging videos with captions, music, and transitions.
SuiteDash Workflow Steps:
1. Create SuiteDash Kickoff Form for upload links and editing style requirements.
2. Automate folder creation: Raw Footage, Drafts, Finals.
3. Assign video editor task checklist (cutting, color correction, captioning).
4. Embed proofing workflow: upload draft in portal, request timestamped feedback.
5. Final approved file uploaded; invoice auto-triggered.
Integrations/Tools: SuiteDash Files/Tasks/Portal, Make (file management), Anytime (scheduling reviews)

Description: Compelling ad, blog, and website copywriting services with strong calls to action.
SuiteDash Workflow Steps:
1. Use SuiteDash form to capture brand voice, target audience, and campaign goals.
2. Auto-create task for copywriter with checklist (research, draft, edit, approve).
3. Portal review page: client views drafts, comments inline.
4. Version control: upload updated drafts, track approvals.
5. Final approval triggers automated delivery email + invoice.
Integrations/Tools: SuiteDash Projects/Files/Portal, ActiveCampaign (test campaigns), Make (Google Docs sync)

Description: High-converting scripts for videos, ads, and explainer content.
SuiteDash Workflow Steps:
1. Kickoff Form: capture topic, length, tone, and reference material.
2. Auto-create writer task in CRM pipeline ‘Scriptwriting’.
3. Draft shared in portal for client feedback.
4. Client comments consolidated; update script versions.
5. Deliver final script in portal; track with CRM status change.
Integrations/Tools: SuiteDash CRM/Portal, ActiveCampaign (script drip content), Make (doc collaboration)

Description: Custom illustrations for branding, social media, and product marketing.
SuiteDash Workflow Steps:
1. SuiteDash intake form: style references, deliverable type.
2. Project auto-created; tasks assigned to illustrator.
3. Review stage built into portal with preview uploads.
4. Feedback loop automated via notifications.
5. Deliver final files in various formats through portal.
Integrations/Tools: SuiteDash Projects/Files, Make (file conversion), ActiveCampaign (showcase email)

Description: Optimized hashtags for increasing reach on social platforms.
SuiteDash Workflow Steps:
1. Form captures niche, content type, and competitors.
2. Task checklist: competitor analysis, trend scan, generate hashtag set.
3. Deliver via portal as downloadable document.
4. Tag project ‘Hashtag Research’ for reporting.
5. Optionally, schedule content with hashtags using external scheduler.
Integrations/Tools: SuiteDash Forms/Tasks/Portal, Make (trend scraping APIs), ActiveCampaign (social campaigns)

Description: Plan and schedule content calendars across multiple platforms.
SuiteDash Workflow Steps:
1. Collect platform credentials/preferences securely.
2. Build content calendar in SuiteDash project tasks.
3. Automate posting via Make integration with platforms.
4. Use client portal to preview scheduled posts.
5. Auto-generate monthly analytics report.
Integrations/Tools: SuiteDash Projects/Portal, Make (social posting), ActiveCampaign (email content sync)

Description: Engage with followers, moderate groups, and respond to inquiries.
SuiteDash Workflow Steps:
1. Set up SuiteDash support desk for community inquiries.
2. Automate notifications for messages needing replies.
3. Track response SLAs in SuiteDash tasks.
4. Weekly summary sent to client via portal.
5. Escalate unresolved issues automatically.
Integrations/Tools: SuiteDash Tickets/Tasks, Make (chatbot integration), ActiveCampaign (community emails)

Description: Personalized DM campaigns for outreach and relationship building.
SuiteDash Workflow Steps:
1. SuiteDash intake form captures target audience/offer.
2. Automate DM lists using Make from social platforms.
3. Track sent/response in SuiteDash CRM custom pipeline.
4. Escalate warm leads to sales pipeline stage.
5. Provide weekly DM outcome reports in portal.
Integrations/Tools: SuiteDash CRM/Portal, Make (social DMs APIs), ActiveCampaign (follow-up nurture)

Description: A/B testing for creatives, ads, or landing pages.
SuiteDash Workflow Steps:
1. Form intake: what asset to test and KPIs.
2. Set up SuiteDash project with tasks for version A & B.
3. Integrate tracking pixels via Make.
4. Collect performance results in SuiteDash dashboard.
5. Report best performer in portal + recommend rollout.
Integrations/Tools: SuiteDash Projects/Dashboards, Make (tracking pixels), ActiveCampaign (A/B emails)

Description: Run retargeting campaigns to re-engage audiences.
SuiteDash Workflow Steps:
1. Form intake for campaign goals and audiences.
2. Auto-create project with ad creative tasks.
3. Use Make to sync SuiteDash contacts into ad platforms.
4. Monitor conversion events; report in dashboard.
5. Portal summary for client ROI reporting.
Integrations/Tools: SuiteDash CRM/Portal, Make (FB/Google Ads sync), ActiveCampaign

Description: Create end-to-end funnels (opt-in, nurture, conversion).
SuiteDash Workflow Steps:
1. Capture funnel goals and audience via form.
2. Build funnel assets: landing page, email sequence, upsells.
3. Tasks auto-assigned: design, copy, integration.
4. Track funnel performance in dashboard.
5. Portal houses funnel assets + client review access.
Integrations/Tools: SuiteDash Projects/Tasks/Portal, ActiveCampaign, Make (landing pages sync)

Description: Audit and optimize conversion touchpoints to boost sales.
SuiteDash Workflow Steps:
1. Form collects analytics access and goals.
2. Tasks for heatmap analysis, UX audit, CRO tweaks.
3. Report issues and wins in portal.
4. Implement changes; track new KPIs.
5. Automated follow-up to review results after 30 days.
Integrations/Tools: SuiteDash Projects/Portal, TruConversion (heatmaps), Make (analytics sync)

Description: Strategic content calendar aligned with marketing goals.
SuiteDash Workflow Steps:
1. SuiteDash form captures objectives and themes.
2. Project task board: each task = content piece.
3. Auto-generate monthly board; assign writers/designers.
4. Use portal calendar for client visibility.
5. Automated reminders for deadlines.
Integrations/Tools: SuiteDash Projects/Calendar, Make (calendar sync), ActiveCampaign

Description: Quality assurance for campaigns and content before launch.
SuiteDash Workflow Steps:
1. Intake checklist of QA parameters.
2. Tasks created: review design, copy, links.
3. Automated testing tasks (forms, emails).
4. Final QA report uploaded to portal.
5. Block launch until QA task complete.
Integrations/Tools: SuiteDash Tasks/Portal, Make (automation testing)

Description: Centralized dashboard for KPIs across campaigns.
SuiteDash Workflow Steps:
1. Identify KPIs and data sources with client.
2. Integrate sources via Make into SuiteDash custom objects.
3. Design dashboard widgets in SuiteDash portal.
4. Automate nightly updates of data.
5. Portal view shared with client.
Integrations/Tools: SuiteDash Dashboards, Make/AITable, Google Analytics/FB Ads

Description: Digital contract creation, signing, and storage.
SuiteDash Workflow Steps:
1. SuiteDash Dynamic Docs setup for contracts.
2. Client fills form; auto-generate contract.
3. Send for e-sign via portal.
4. Automate signed doc storage in client folder.
5. Trigger invoice post-signature.
Integrations/Tools: SuiteDash Dynamic Docs/Portal, Make (doc backup), ActiveCampaign (confirmation emails)

Description: Curated prompt libraries for AI-powered workflows.
SuiteDash Workflow Steps:
1. Form intake: desired categories/use-cases.
2. Auto-create project library with categorized prompts.
3. Upload files in portal knowledge base.
4. Automate tagging and search indexing.
5. Periodic updates pushed to clients.
Integrations/Tools: SuiteDash Wiki/Portal, Make (updates push)

Description: Implement AI-driven automations for repetitive tasks.
SuiteDash Workflow Steps:
1. Identify tasks for automation with client.
2. Design workflow in SuiteDash or Make.
3. Integrate AI APIs via Make (OpenAI, etc.).
4. Log outputs in SuiteDash tasks.
5. Review & refine quarterly.
Integrations/Tools: SuiteDash Automations, Make/n8n, AI APIs

Description: Manage influencer collaborations and reporting.
SuiteDash Workflow Steps:
1. Form intake: influencer list and goals.
2. Project board with each influencer as task.
3. Track deliverables and due dates.
4. Portal reporting for client visibility.
5. Automated reminders for influencer deadlines.
Integrations/Tools: SuiteDash Projects/Portal, Make (social sync), ActiveCampaign

Description: Gamify engagement with rewards, points, and leaderboards.
SuiteDash Workflow Steps:
1. Define gamification rules with client.
2. Custom objects in SuiteDash for points tracking.
3. Automate point allocation via triggers (form submissions, tasks).
4. Portal displays leaderboard widget.
5. Automate rewards distribution via email.
Integrations/Tools: SuiteDash Portal/Custom Objects, Make, ActiveCampaign

Description: Conversion-focused landing pages optimized for campaigns.
SuiteDash Workflow Steps:
1. Form captures campaign goal and assets.
2. Auto-create project for design tasks.
3. Portal for client review of mockups.
4. Publish and test page; integrate tracking.
5. Final approval triggers campaign launch tasks.
Integrations/Tools: SuiteDash Projects/Portal, Make (page builder sync), ActiveCampaign

Description: Setup of tracking codes and pixels across platforms.
SuiteDash Workflow Steps:
1. Form collects site/platform details.
2. Task checklist for code placement.
3. Make sync to deploy pixels in CMS.
4. Verify data in SuiteDash dashboard.
5. Portal confirmation report shared.
Integrations/Tools: SuiteDash Projects/Dashboards, Make (deploy pixels), Google/FB Ads

Description: Collect and manage user-generated content campaigns.
SuiteDash Workflow Steps:
1. Create SuiteDash form for UGC submissions.
2. Auto-create task to review each submission.
3. Approved UGC stored in portal folder.
4. Automated notifications to clients of new content.
5. Monthly UGC report delivered.
Integrations/Tools: SuiteDash Forms/Files/Portal, Make (content moderation AI), ActiveCampaign
